name: TUS
description:
TUS is a fun, fast-paced shooter for you and your friends to play!

Enjoy a massive catalog of game modes, including:

  • Deathmatch, Kill everyone you see
  • Team Deathmatch, It's deathmatch but with your comrades!
  • Capture The Flag, You gotta capture the flag... with yer friends!
  • Stealth, Creep up on your enemies slowly to win

With more coming in the future!

More information will come when the game is close to finishing development. However, if you want updates now, feel free to join our discord server!
